name: verso
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the back of a piece of paper, document, etc.: The verso of the manuscript fragment shows more deterioration than the recto.
a page on the left side of an open book, etc.: At the beginning of a book, on the verso (left-hand) page, the name of the publisher is usually given. For information: the verso always carries the even page number and the recto the odd number.
More examplesFewer examplesThe reverse side (verso) of the page had been covered with a whitish substance.This seemed to be a waste of paper, since three of the four versos were left blank.There is an ex parliamentary library stamp on the title and verso of several of the plates.
